name: Perseus (Demo)
description:
Devlog

Please tell me your opinion.

Donations will help me to create more levels

Perseus is action-platformer game based on the myth of Perseus and his quest to kill Medusa. This is the first level demo as the game is under development. The game uses graphics that are similar to ancient Greek pottery art.

During the intro Press Ctrl to move faster to the next scene and Enter in order to skip the Intro.

Use the Left and Right keys to walk, Up and Space key to perform a jump

Enter Key to Enter Houses

Backspace to Pause the game
